document.full_text: bahrain should suspend prosecution of civilians in military courts and set up an impartial commission to look into allegations of torture during a clampdown on those involved in street protests, a u.s-based rights group said.
document.title: bahrain should set up torture investigation body: rights group
lines_and_colors: bahrain should suspend prosecution of civilians in military courts and set up an impartial commission to look into allegations of torture during a clampdown on those involved in street protests, a u.s-based rights group said.
